page.title: 14Women's Recreation
page.content: Of 40 women questioned about their leisuretime activities; 21 said that gardening was one of their hobbies; 12 said that knitting was a hobby; 25 had indoor hobbies other than knitting and keep-fit; 11 had outdoor hobbies other than gardening, including cycling (1), tennis (1), horse-riding (1), ski-ing (1); 4 ladies went to keep-fit classes. We concluded that more women (21) did gardening than men (12); that men are more active than women because three quarters of the men took an active part in outdoor sport and only just over one quarter of the women took an active part in sports.
